message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love.
I'm really interested in the product, but $120 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $90.
I understand that $120 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can offer you the product for $110. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy it!
I appreciate the willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $95?

I understand that you're really close to making a decision, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to go down to $105, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
I appreciate your flexibility, but $105 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from the $100 I can get from John, so I'll offer $102.50
